summary: A re-texture of Vanilla Imperial plate armor for males & females.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://static1.squarespace.com/static/5439b943e4b0cf5af6b81b79/t/56b28024d51cd4f69f0ca1ef/1454538789497/5FablesLogo-Nexus.png[/img]
WHAT IS ANTIQUED IMPERIAL PLATE
This mod is a re-texture of the vanilla imperial plate armor that replaces the "chalky" look of the default armor with a richer burnished finish that I find more appealing.  Imperial Plate now looks lived in and as if it's been cared for on the battle field with polish and oils. This texture is a replacer so all the Imperial Plate armors will have the burnished finish.

This mod was created for use in my 5 Fables story on YouTube.

WHAT IS INCLUDED
1. Imperial Steel Boots/Greaves
2. Imperial Steel Gauntlets/Bracers
3. Imperial Steel Cuirass Male
4. Imperial Steel Cuirass Female
5. Imperial Steel Helm
6. Imperial Steel Officer's Helm
7. Imperial Steel Full Helm
8. Imperial Shield

INSTALLATION
This is a straight forward texture replacer.  I recommend using your favorite Mod Manager for installation.

-------------------------------------------------
CHECK OUT THE 5 FABLES STORY AT COUCHWARRIORTV ON YOUTUBE: youtube.charactercrusade.com
